answers.answer: I had mine done and it was the 3 hour one, not sure why I didnt get the 1 hour test done first but my Dr told me to go in at 8:30 in the morning without eating anything and then I didnt eat anything until aftet I got out which was like at 11:30am. Maybe you failed the first one because you are something?
Good luck btw, I hope everything turns out fine.
Idk why I failed I fasted, didn't eat past 9pm the night before my test was at  10am ugh I have to get blood drawn 3 times in 3 hours this is going to   s u c k!
I wasn't able to eat or drink anything except the fruit punch drink he gave me to drink for the test hope everything goes well

Im doing the 3 hr one as i type.. idk how i failed the first since i fasted even when i was allowed to eat. This time i fasted .. alrdy drank the drink and got my blood drawn.. here till 11ish. Bring a book or something. They said to bring a protien snack. Ima just grab something when i head back. Idk why it seemed sweeter this time or if its cause im sick.. feel like puking.
What is the glucose test? I'm 21wks maybe not far enough along...but I keep seeing this referenced, and it takes 3 hours? That's a long test!
First trys an hr if u dont pass its three hrs when u retake it.. sugar diabetes test
How do u fail it? I always passed mine. They said u fail if u throw up or cant keep it down or drink it in their time limit is that how u guys failed?
Nope i kept it down and drank it in time.
Hmm how would they say someone failed then I'm so confused
Its not based on oh if u eat alot of sweets or fasted or didnt, everyones bodys diff. Its how your body takes and reacts to sugar.
It's very common to fail the first one.  You don't have control over it...you either have it or you don't.

title: 3 hour glucose test
